name: You Win！
description:
You win? Yes!! You win huge coins!
---So 100 reward-windows pop onetime for you to collect all your coins !

Every Best you win? Yes!! All the grounds you are winner!
You win everything on the earth! You are the best!Collect all the coins you get!!

Collect your rewards--coins, and unlock new scene for you to win and collect more coins！Update and build your winner system to collect more and more coins.

easy and fun！

-Free to play
-Endless gameplay and upgrades
-No internet connection required
-Play in a boring class or meeting
-Play in a down feeling
